sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define SEO refresh workflow: audits, prioritization, briefs, execution, and QA.

sections.title: Audit & Prioritization
sections.content: Identify underperforming pages, cannibalization, and gaps; prioritization criteria.

sections.content: Brief templates, keyword mapping, internal linking plans, and rewrite standards.

sections.title: Measurement & Iteration
sections.content: Rank tracking, CTR, conversions, and 30/60/90-day review cadence.
